about_the_game:
Ever since you were a child you had an innate ability to sense the presence of the paranormal. These specters that haunt the world are identified and exorcised by those of the religious occult as a means of protecting the world from the supernatural. As an adult now, you have joined the organization and now travel the world to different locations identifying and exorcising these beings.

Specters is a psychological horror that focuses on paying attention to your surroundings, making quick decisions, and knowing when to not be a risk-taker. Utilize ghost detection hardware, the sounds you hear, and what you see to help determine what you are dealing with.

Once you or your team have identified the Specter you are dealing with, prepare the scene for an exorcism by trapping the paranormal and exorcising it.

Multiplayer

Play alone or with a team up to 4 players to identify what paranormal being you are dealing with and then perform an exorcism together to cleanse the location.

Atmospheric Immersion

Through the use of realistic 3D graphics, Ambient 3D Directional Audio, immerse yourself in the world and feel as though you are really hunting specters.

Speech Recognition

Utilize your microphone to interact with the Specters. They will hear you and respond to you if they understand your request, be mindful, asking the wrong question or asking too many questions will anger the spirit. Speak to the Specter to gather intelligence to help determine what it is you are dealing with.

Specters

Identify the Specter you are dealing with based on how they behave, the environment, what they say or what they do. Each ghost exists within a category, some are more hostile than others, some simply want to play. Hunt down 10+ different specter variants and release them from this world.

Identification and Exorcism

Identify the Specter that is haunting a location and exorcise it. Earn money to buy better equipment to assist with the identification and exorcism of said Specters. Learn what type of supernatural being it is, learn about their past life, why they died and why the continue to cling onto this world.

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 2600 or Intel i7-6700
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
